name: ENERGEMS
description:
Grab gems to save the world!

ENERGEMS is a fast-paced jumpy First Person Platformer developed in Unreal Engine 5

You have to recover all of the "Energems" in order to fix the energy core and save the world

Hope you all enjoy my game!

Controls
  • W,A,S,D - Move
  • Shift - Run
  • Space - Jump
  • Right Mouse - Teleport
Install instructions
  • Extract all from the .ZIP
  • Run the .EXE
